languages.text: "Юли, убегай, прячься за чужими спинами. От справедливости не скрыться — она прошьет тебя насквозь. Только дай время".
"You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."
languages.original_text: "Юли, убегай, прячься за чужими спинами. От справедливости не скрыться — она прошьет тебя насквозь. Только дай время".

traits.locale_text: "You can wriggle; you can run; you can hide behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through. Just give it time."
"You can wriggle; you can run; you can hide behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through. Just give it time."
"You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through. Just give it time."
"You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through. Just give it time."
"You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."
"You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."

languages.text: "Ihr könnt Euch winden, könnt weglaufen, Euch hinter dem Rücken anderer ducken. Aber Ihr könnt Euch nicht vor der Gerechtigkeit verstecken. Sie wird Euch durchbohren wie eine Nadel. Lasst ihr nur etwas Zeit."
languages.original_text: "You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt Euch winden, könnt weglaufen, Euch hinter dem Rücken anderer ducken. Aber Ihr könnt Euch nicht vor der Gerechtigkeit verstecken. Sie wird Euch durchbohren wie eine Nadel. Lasst ihr nur etwas Zeit."

languages.text: « Vous pouvez lutter, essayer de fuir ou vous cacher derrière d'autres personnes, mais personne n'échappe à la justice. Tôt ou tard, elle finira par vous transpercer comme une épée. »
languages.original_text: "You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez lutter, essayer de fuir ou vous cacher derrière d'autres personnes, mais personne n'échappe à la justice. Tôt ou tard, elle finira par vous transpercer comme une épée. »

languages.text: “随便你怎么求饶，怎么逃命都好，哪怕躲在别人背后也无所谓。没人能逃脱正义的审判，它必将像尖针一样刺穿你的心脏。我们走着瞧吧。”
languages.original_text: "You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."

traits.locale_text: “随便你怎么求饶，怎么逃命都好，哪怕躲在别人背后也无所谓。没人能逃脱正义的审判，它必将像尖针一样刺穿你的心脏。我们走着瞧吧。”
“随便你怎么求饶，怎么逃命都好，哪怕躲在别人背后也无所谓。没人能逃脱正义的审判，它必将刺穿你的心脏。我们走着瞧吧。”

languages.text: «Puedes resistirte, correr y esconderte detrás de los demás, pero no puedes escapar a la justicia. Te atravesará como una aguja. Tiempo al tiempo».
languages.original_text: "You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."

traits.locale_text: «Puedes resistirte, correr y esconderte detrás de los demás, pero no puedes escapar a la justicia. Te atravesará como una aguja. Tiempo al tiempo».

languages.text: 「足掻くがいい。逃げ回って他人の後ろに隠れても無駄だ。正義から逃れることはできない。それはいずれ、針のようにお前を貫くだろう。その時まで待ってろよ」
languages.original_text: "You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."

traits.locale_text: 「足掻くがいい。逃げ回って他人の後ろに隠れても無駄だ。正義から逃れることはできない。それはいずれ、針のようにお前を貫くだろう。その時まで待ってろよ」

languages.text: "Sürün, kaç, başkalarının ardına gizlen... Fakat asla adaletten kaçamazsın. Bir iğne misali seni delip geçer. Zaman işini görecektir."
languages.original_text: "You can wriggle; you can run; you can cower behind others' backs. But there is no hiding from justice. It will pierce you right through, like a needle. Just give it time."

traits.locale_text: "Sürün, kaç, başkalarının ardına gizlen... Fakat asla adaletten kaçamazsın. Bir iğne misali seni delip geçer. Zaman işini görecektir."
